article_node.title: FIRST ON FOX: Border Patrol union endorses ex-Trump DOJ official for state AG
article_node.summary: The National Border Patrol Council has endorsed Aaron Reitz, a former Trump DOJ official, for Texas Attorney General as current AG Ken Paxton opts to run for the U.S. Senate. Reitz, a Marine veteran and former chief of staff to Senator Ted Cruz, aims to secure the Texas border and combat Biden administration policies. His campaign gains momentum with the NBPC's support, emphasizing his commitment to border security and legal strategies against immigration policies.
